doc.str: In a face image recording apparatus, a camera photographs the face of a person a plurality of number of times, a processor extracts at least one high-quality image from the plurality of images photographed by the camera, and this high-quality image extracted by the processor is recorded in a memory.

Fukui et al., "Facial Feature Point Extraction Method Based on Combination of Shape Extraction Pattern Matching," Journal of IEICE D-II, vol. J-80-D-II, No. 8, Aug. 1997, pp. 2170-2177. cited by other . | "Open Source Computer Vision Library" 2000, INTEL Corporation, USA, XP002376488; Chapter 2; p. 1--Chapter 2 p. 23. cited by other . | European Search Report dated Jul. 3, 2006 for Appln. No. 02011552.3-2218. cited by other . | U.S. Appl. No. 10/226,329, filed Aug. 23, 2002, Sukegawa et al. cited by other . | U.S. Appl. No. 10/205,359, filed Jul. 26, 2002, Dobashi. cited by other . | Gong et al; Dynamic Vision: From Images to Face recognition: 2000; Imperial College Press, London, XP002380777. cited by other. | Yamaguchi et al., "Face Recognition System Using Temporal Image Sequence," Technical Report of IEICE PROM97-50, Jun. 1997, pp. 17-24. cited by other . | Konew W. et al.; "Zn-Face: A System for Access Control Using Automated Face Recognition"; International Workshop on Automati Face-and Gesture-recognition: Jun. 26, 1995; pp. 18-23; XP 000675537. cited by oth- er .
